snippet: The vitamin seems to prevent lung damage by slowing down inflammatory responses to the TB bacterium, according to a new study.
abstract: Study in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences shows that high doses of vitamin D speed the recovery of tuberculosis patients by slowing inflammatory responses to TB bacterium.
lead_paragraph: The vitamin seems to prevent lung damage by slowing down inflammatory responses to the TB bacterium, according to a new study.

headline.seo: Vitamin D Speeds Recovery From Tuberculosis, Scientists Report
headline.main: Tuberculosis: Taking High Doses of Vitamin D Speeds Recovery, Scientists Report
headline.print_headline: Tuberculosis: Taking High Doses of Vitamin D Speeds Recovery, Scientists Report

keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
